column4: I asked this earlier, but had to run. How do I run a rpm for the Java sdk 1.4.2_8?  I just need the command.  I tried rpm <java_sdk.rpm>
alien would work, but it's better to download the bin, apt-get install java-package, then run "fakeroot make-jpkg j2sdk-foo.bin"
the Ubuntu way is to use sudo
get the bin, not the rpm, install java-package and make a deb to dpkg -i using java-package.
